recipe.title: Fruit Salad with Honey and Rum
ingredients: 1 large Fuji or Golden Delicious apple, unpeeled, cored, diced
1 cup seedless red and green grapes
instructions: Whisk honey and rum in large bowl to blend. Add bitters, if desired. Cut away peel and pith from orange. Working over same bowl, cut between membranes to release orange segments and juice into bowl. Mix in remaining fruit. Chill at least 30 minutes and up to 4 hours.
